JapanTrip.LocationDescription: There are many Disney Parks around the world but did you know that Disney Sea exists only in Japan? Tokyo Disney Sea opened in 2001 as a part of the Tokyo Disney Resort and it was the ninth worldwide Disney themepark to open out of the eleven that currently exist. There are many rides, foods, and amazing performances that will blow your mind away.

Universal Studios Japan ranked Japan's best theme park four years in a row! Opened in March 2001 in the Osaka Bay Area, the theme park occupies an area of 39 hectares and is the most visited amusement park in Japan after Tokyo Disney Resort. The amusement park has different themes with thrilling rides and food, such as Anime, Harry Potter, Nintendo World, and many more.
he castle is one of Japan's most famous landmarks and it played a major role in the unification of Japan during the sixteenth century of the Azuchi-Momoyama period.

JapanTrip.LocationAddress: Kyōto, city, seat of Kyōto fu (urban prefecture), west-central Honshu island, Japan
JapanTrip.LocationDescription: The Historic Monuments of Ancient Kyoto (Kyoto, Uji and Otsu Cities) represent the imperial capital of Japan and formed the center of Japanese culture for thousand years (from 794). This still can be seen in the religious wooden architecture, and the landscape gardens.

JapanTrip.LocationAddress: It is a station located between Shibuya and Shinjuku on the JR Yamanote loop line around central Tokyo.
JapanTrip.LocationDescription: Harajuku is the center of Japan's most extreme teenage cultures and fashion styles, but also has many stores for adults to go shopping and some historic sights for sight seeing.
